overview: John leads the product team at Graphight as an innovative and intuitive product professional. After serving as VP of Product at Yahoo!, John teamed with a former partner, Andy Wilson, to found Graphight. In fact, Graphight marks Johnâ€™s third time teaming up with Andy. John previously served as Senior Director of Product Management at Overture Services, before Yahoo! acquired the company, and as Director of Product Management at RiverOne. Johnâ€™s professional network includes a broad group of product development and engineering pros, marketing experts, technology experts, technology executives, as well as a healthy dose of fellow alums from Michigan State University, where he received a BA in English.
